name: Wear That Mask!
description:
You are asymptomatic and infectious with coronavirus and need some essential items. You need to wear a mask to protect others, but you have asthma! Keep your breathing meter up so you don't have an asthma attack but be aware of the people you may infect!

Disclaimer: There is little evidence supporting that masks harm your oxygen levels. The asthma mechanic was just something included to enhance game play! Please wear a mask when you are out in public, you have the power to protect people!

This game was created by mimmy and CosmicCrowMC

Programming : CosmicCrowMC

Art : mimmy with help of CosmicCrowMC

Music & SFX : mimmy

CosmicCrowMC's youtube channel
